results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. x^2*exp(4*x).
comment: Old name was: A simple grammar.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 737
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (12,-48,64).
program: (PARI) vector(30, n, n--; 4^(n-2)*n*(n-1)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 20 2019
(Sage) [4^(n-2)*n*(n-1) for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 20 2019
